subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Go Between prevailed in a long stretch battle with Well Armed on Sunday to win the $1 million Pacific Classic at Del Mar Racetrack. Go Between, ridden by Garrett Gomez, won by a neck, finishing the mile and a quarter in 2 minutes 1.18 seconds. Mast Track was third. The victory gave Go Between an automatic spot in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
